knimeNode.name: Football Teams
knimeNode.shortDescription: Retrieves all teams for a specific league and season from API-Sports.

intro.p: Fetches all teams participating in a specific league and season. This node provides the team IDs needed for other nodes like Football Stats.
The output table includes: Team ID, Name, Code, Country, Founded year, Venue name, City, and Logo URL.
Workflow Pattern: Use Football Leagues node first to find the league ID, then use this node to get teams for that league.

fullDescription.option: The ID of the league to fetch teams for. Use the Football Leagues node to find league IDs. Default: 39 (Premier League)
The season year (e.g., 2024). Must be between 2000 and 2100. Default: 2024

ports.inPort: Connection to API-Sports service (from API-Sports Connector node)
ports.outPort: Table containing all teams for the specified league and season
